titleStmt.title: Piers Plainnes seauen yeres prentiship by H.C.
titleStmt.author: Chettle, Henry, d. 1607?

publicationStmt.publisher: By I. Danter for Thomas Gosson, and are to be sold at his shop by London bridge Gate,
